items.sentence: Tom says he wants to buy a present for Mary.
Mary didn\'t tell me Tom was her ex-husband.
Tom asked me if he could borrow my umbrella.
Tom asked me to pick Mary up at the airport.
Tom asked me who the girl with red hair was.
Tom asked the waitress to refill his coffee.
Tom asked us not to wear shoes in his house.
I think it was Tom who might have done that.
I think it was Tom who told Mary to do that.
Please wake me up at seven tomorrow morning.
Put the dough in the refrigerator overnight.
Rain, rain, go away. Come again another day.
She acknowledged that my statement was true.
She advised him that he should stay at home.
Tom and Mary are members of the same church.
Tom and Mary are really made for each other.
Tom and Mary finally decided to get married.
I\'ll never forget what you\'ve done for us.
I want to find an apartment close to school.
I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.
